alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:55PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches up to 5500 feet, 6 to 12 inches from 5500 to 7000 feet, locally higher. For Western Canyonlands, expect heaviest accumulations west of Hanksville. * WHERE...Zion National Park, Bryce Canyon Country, South Central Utah, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected across the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
